00002 //      project:      hyperspace explorer

00009 
00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_H
00012 
00013 
00014 #include "Vec.H"
00015 
00016 //  matrix<D>: a DxD matrix
00017 template <unsigned D> class matrix {
00018 public:
00019     matrix<D> ();
00020     matrix<D> (double, double, double, double, double, double);
00021     matrix<D> (unsigned, unsigned, double);
00022     virtual ~matrix<D> () { }
00023 
00024     double &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00025         return M[i][j]; }
00026 
00027     matrix<D> operator * (const matrix<D> &) const;
00028     Vec<D> operator * (const Vec<D> &);
00029 
00030   //    string Print ();
00031 
00032 protected:
00033     double M[D][D];
00034 };
00035 
00036 //  default constructor: creates a unity DxD matrix
00037 template<unsigned D> matrix<D>::matrix<D> () {
00038     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                  //  i: row
00039         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                //  j: col
00040             M[i][j] = 0;
00041         M[i][i] = 1;
00042     }
00043 }
00044 
00045 template <unsigned D> matrix<D>::matrix<D> (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw, double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw) {
00046   cerr << "matrix<" << D <<">::matrix<" << D <<"> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw) not yet implemented!" << endl;
00047   abort();
00048 }
00049 
00050 //  matrix<D> (ii, jj, Theta): creates a rotation about axes ii and jj of angle Theta
00051 template<unsigned D> matrix<D>::matrix<D> (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, double Theta) {
00052     double c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00053     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                  //  i: row
00054         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                //  j: col
00055             M[i][j] = 0;
00056         M[i][i] = 1;
00057     }
00058     M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00059     M[ii][jj] = -s;
00060     M[jj][ii] = s;
00061 }
00062 
00063 //  matrix multiplication
00064 template <unsigned D> matrix<D> matrix<D>::operator * (const matrix<D> &B) const {
00065     matrix<D> C;
00066     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                    //  i: row
00067         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {              //  j: col
00068             double s = 0;
00069             for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00070                 s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00071             C.M[i][j] = s;
00072         }
00073     return C;
00074 }
00075 
00076 //  apply the matrix on a vector
00077 template <unsigned D> Vec<D> matrix<D>::operator * (const Vec<D> &V) {
00078   Vec<D> W;
00079   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                //  i: row
00080     double s = 0;
00081     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)            //  j: col
00082       s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00083     W[i] = s;
00084   }
00085   return W;
00086 }

00088 #include <strstream>

00095         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
